member.name: T:Gasolutions.Core.Repository.Interfaces.IReadGenericRepository
member.summary: Defines a contract for a generic read repository.

member.name: M:Gasolutions.Core.Repository.Interfaces.IReadGenericRepository.QueryAndReturnJson(System.String,System.Data.CommandType)
member.summary: Queries the data source and returns the result as JSON.
member.param: The command text to execute against the data source.
The type of the command (e.g., Text, StoredProcedure).
member.returns: A JSON string containing the query results.
member.exception: Thrown when there is an error executing the query.

member.name: T:Gasolutions.Core.Repository.Interfaces.IReadGenericRepository`2
member.summary: Defines the contract for a read-only repository that provides data access for entities of type with a primary key of type .
member.typeparam: The type of the primary key.

member.summary: Queries the repository for entities matching the specified criteria.
member.param: The criteria or primary key value.
member.returns: An representing the matching entities.

member.summary: Queries the repository for entities matching the specified criteria and allows ordering the results.

member.summary: Gets the maximum value of the specified field for the specified table.
member.param: The criteria or primary key value.
member.returns: The maximum value as a nullable TKey.

member.name: T:Gasolutions.Core.Repository.Interfaces.IWriteGenericRepository`2
member.summary: Defines a repository with methods for adding, updating, and deleting entities of type in the data source. This is the write-only part of the repository, meant to be used when the data is not needed to be read immediately after being written.
member.typeparam: The type of the entities in the repository.
The type of the primary key of the entities.

member.summary: Inserts a new entity into the data source.
